name: Amphibolt
description: The Amphibolt is a large monstrosity with good strength and agility, capable of existing both in water and on land. It resembles a large rock when motionless, making it a master of ambush tactics.
memorable: Its unique Lightning Leap ability allows it to jump long distances while dealing damage and potentially knocking opponents prone.
goals: To ambush creatures and control the battlefield using its mobility and powerful attacks.
relations: It may associate with other aquatic or amphibious creatures, as well as predatory animals in its environment.
environment: Typically found in areas with both land and water, such as riverbanks, swamps, or coastal regions.
strengths: High Dexterity and Constitution scores ensure agility and durability in combat.
weaknesses: Very low Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma, limiting its mental capabilities and social interactions.
attacks: The Amphibolt can inflict significant damage with its Bite attacks, dealing piercing and lightning damage, and has the capability to swallow opponents whole.
most_powerful_ability: Lightning Leap, which allows it to make long jumps and deal both bludgeoning and lightning damage to enemies in its path.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing it to see in dark or dim light conditions.
skills: Has an average perception skill, though its low Wisdom indicates it may miss subtle details.
additional_information: Immunity to lightning damage makes it a resilient foe against electrical attacks.
False Appearance ability allows it to hide effectively from unsuspecting prey.
Can only swallow one creature at a time, highlighting its predatory focus.
Lightning damage adds a flexibility to its attack strategy.
Amphibious nature provides advantages in diverse combat situations.
